tr_quotes.quote: Bugün, endişe duyduğunuz dünün yarınıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Emek istiyor, üzülmek bile.
tr_quotes.author: İbrahim Tenekeci

tr_quotes.quote: Bir hastalığa üzülmek onu iyileştirmez.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Üzülmek iyi insanların işidir.
tr_quotes.author: Ethem Emin Nemutlu

tr_quotes.quote: Üzülmek fethedilmiştir.
tr_quotes.author: Cahit Zarifoğlu

tr_quotes.quote: Üzülmek istiyorum ama zaman bulamıyorum!
tr_quotes.author: Akın Alıcı

tr_quotes.quote: İçimdeki çocuk çok mutsuz! Kimse bana oyuncak vermeye kalkmasın kırarım...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Üzmeyin beni, vallahi halim kalmadı.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sevmek kolay olsa da unutmak zordur!
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bir damla hüzündür kalbimden gözlerime yansıyan.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bırak, kader ve üzüntü kuşları, başının üstünden geçsinler. Sen onları değiştiremezsin; fakat onların saçlarının arasında, kendilerine yuva yapmasına engel olabilirsin.
tr_quotes.author: Çin Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Doğmuş olmak için doğmadığına inan ki, bu dünya da üzüntünün sonu yok, ama mutluluğun vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Atakan Korkmaz

tr_quotes.quote: Üzülme değmez sözünü duymaktan sıkıldım. Değmeyenlere zaten üzülmem. Üzüldüğüm şey; değmeyenlere yüreğimin değmiş olması.
tr_quotes.author: Cemal Süreya

tr_quotes.quote: İki kişiye üzülmek gerekir: Her gün vebal yüklenen kimse ile, hiçbir hayır işlenmeyen kimse.
tr_quotes.author: Beydeba

tr_quotes.quote: Mutluluğa giden yol tektir, o da üzüntüleri bir kenara bırakmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Küçük üzüntüler sineklere benzer, biraz hareket ve biraz eylemle onları kovabiliriz.
tr_quotes.author: Gustav White

tr_quotes.quote: Elde edemediklerine üzülen bir kişi, sahip olduklarıyla asla mutlu olamaz
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Oysa ne çok ağladım ben bir damla yaş dökmeden...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Artık şiir yazamayacak bir şair kadar incindim. Duygularım yerle yekzan...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sustum... İçimi sadece secdelere döküyorum. Zira insanlardan çok incindim...
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yangını çıkardıktan sonra küllere bakıp üzülmek boşunadır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Birlikte sevinmek değil, birlikte üzülmek arkadaş yapar.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Üzülmek istemiyorsan, Allah’tan başkasına bağlanmayacaksın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Gidenler geri dönmediklerine üzülmek zorunda değil.
tr_quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

tr_quotes.quote: Bir süre üzülmek, bir ömür üzülmekten iyidir.
tr_quotes.author: Hasan Çep

tr_quotes.quote: Geçmişin başarısızlığına üzülmek, geleceğin fırsatlarını kaçırmaktır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bir yere kadar üzülmek, bir yerden sonra vazgeçmeyi bilmek gerek.
tr_quotes.author: Akif Bayrak

tr_quotes.quote: Üzülmek çare olsaydı hiçbir aşk yarı yolda kalmazdı.
tr_quotes.author: Sezgin Kocabaş

tr_quotes.quote: Üzülmek, bir gemiyi denizin derinliklerinden kurtarmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Aiz El-Karni

tr_quotes.quote: Üzülmek denilen şeyin mekanizmasını işletmeyi unutmuştu.
tr_quotes.author: Sait Faik Abasıyanık

tr_quotes.quote: Gidenlere üzülmek yerine gelecek olanlara tebessüm et.
tr_quotes.author: Hasan Çep

tr_quotes.quote: Dünya malı için üzülmek kalbe zulüm, ahret için üzülmek ise kalbe nurdur.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Osman

tr_quotes.quote: Sahip olmadığımız şey için üzülmek, sahip olduğumuz şeyi israf etmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Sally Thorne

tr_quotes.quote: Bir insan, üzülmek yerine akıllanmayı tercih ettiği zaman ondan korkun.
tr_quotes.author: Arda Erel

tr_quotes.quote: Evet, değişen fazla bir şey yok. Üzülmek hâlâ hepimizin baba mesleği.
tr_quotes.author: İbrahim Tenekeci

tr_quotes.quote: Üzülmek, yarının sıkıntısından bir şey eksiltmez sadece bugünün gücünü tüketir.
tr_quotes.author: Cem Keçe

tr_quotes.quote: Bazı zamanlar yapayalnız kalmak, yalnız başıma üzülmek istiyor canım.
tr_quotes.author: Dostoyevski

tr_quotes.quote: Gözyaşı dökmek için illa üzülmek mi gerekiyordu? Soğan koklasak olmaz mı?
tr_quotes.author: Khaled Hosseini

tr_quotes.quote: Üzülmek kolaydır. Üzülmek çok kolaydır ve kimseye bir yararı olmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Stephen King

tr_quotes.quote: Üzülmek istemiyorsan anahtar deliğinden bakmayacaksın, derdi sevgili yaşlı annem.
tr_quotes.author: Stephen King

tr_quotes.quote: Üzgün görünüyorsun azizim diyorlar. Üzülmek mi? O da ne? Hissizim artık diyemiyorum.
tr_quotes.author: Nazan Arısoy

tr_quotes.quote: Birisinin ölümüne üzülmek bile, o kimse için bambaşka bir ölüm düşlediğiniz içindir.
tr_quotes.author: Şule Gürbüz

tr_quotes.quote: Kaybettikten sonra üzülmek yerine daha kazanmadan sevinmeyi tercih edenlerdeniz biz.
tr_quotes.author: Burak Aksak

tr_quotes.quote: Üzülmek ve acı çekmek, büyük bilinçler ve derin yürekler için her zaman zorunludur!
tr_quotes.author: Dostoyevski

tr_quotes.quote: Ne büyük zevktir beti benzi solana dek üzülmek, bütün dünyaya surat asmak.
tr_quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

tr_quotes.quote: Tüm hazlar hayalidir ve bunların yokluğuna üzülmek dar kafalılıktır, hatta gülünçtür.
tr_quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

tr_quotes.quote: Kim bilir üzüntün şimdi senin ne büyüktür ama Tanrı’nın aldığına üzülmek, insana yüktür.
tr_quotes.author: Maksim Gorki

tr_quotes.quote: İncitme sen ahbabını incinmeye senden. Bu alem-i fanide zarafet budur işte.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Sen hiç kendine ağladın mı? Ben çok ağladım. Uyandığım bu dünyada en çok kendime acırdım. En umutsuz arkadaşıydım, arkadaşların. İstiridyenin içinde yaşamaya razıydım, incin olmalıydım.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ne kadar az yüksekten uçarsan, düştüğün zaman o kadar az incinirsin.
tr_quotes.author: Tibet atasözü

en_quotes.quote: Nothing always stays the same. You don't stay happy forever. You don't stay sad forever
en_quotes.author: Cat Zingano

en_quotes.quote: Heavy hearts, like heavy clouds in the sky, are best relieved by the letting of a little water
en_quotes.author: Christopher Morley

en_quotes.quote: Sadness flies away on the wings of time
en_quotes.author: Jean de La Fontaine

en_quotes.quote: Tears come from the heart and not from the brain
en_quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

en_quotes.quote: It's okay to be sad if things don't go the way you had hoped
en_quotes.author: Jessie James Decker

en_quotes.quote: Oh, I am very weary, Though tears no longer flow; My eyes are tired of weeping, My heart is sick of woe
en_quotes.author: Anne Bronte

en_quotes.quote: I know what I look like - a weird, sad clown puppet. I'm fine with that
en_quotes.author: Rainn Wilson

en_quotes.quote: We can feel sad, hurt, demoralized. But we can't give up
en_quotes.author: Patrisse Cullors

en_quotes.quote: I have a piece of great and sad news to tell you: I am dead
en_quotes.author: Jean Cocteau

en_quotes.quote: Tears are nature's lotion for the eyes. The eyes see better for being washed by them
en_quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

en_quotes.quote: The good times of today, are the sad thoughts of tomorrow
en_quotes.author: Bob Marley

en_quotes.quote: It's just sad that one's attitude is always speculated, even if you've not done something
en_quotes.author: Karan Patel

en_quotes.quote: Keep it simple, keep it sexy, keep it sad
en_quotes.author: Mitch Miller

en_quotes.quote: It's sad to know I'm done. But looking back, I've got a lot of great memories
en_quotes.author: Bonnie Blair

en_quotes.quote: Delicious tears! The heart's own dew
en_quotes.author: Letitia Elizabeth Landon

en_quotes.quote: We never taste happiness in perfection, our most fortunate successes are mixed with sadness
en_quotes.author: Pierre Corneille

en_quotes.quote: I can be dramatic. I can be funny. I can be sexy. I can be sad. I can be glad
en_quotes.author: Kimberly Elise

en_quotes.quote: Sad things happen. They do. But we don't need to live sad forever
en_quotes.author: Mattie Stepanek

en_quotes.quote: Never make a decision when you are upset, sad, jealous or in love
en_quotes.author: Mario Teguh

en_quotes.quote: Feeling sad or lonely isn't a bad thing. But those emotions increase the risk that you'll cross the line into self-pity
en_quotes.author: Amy Morin

en_quotes.quote: Certain emotions just take you to the notes - being furious, heroic, sad, erotic, when rain comes
en_quotes.author: Jeff Buckley

en_quotes.quote: You'd die very sad if you tried to make everyone in the world happy, you know what I mean? You can't; no one can
en_quotes.author: G-Eazy

en_quotes.quote: A teardrop on earth summons the King of heaven
en_quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

en_quotes.quote: The word 'happy' would lose its meaning if it were not balanced by sadness
en_quotes.author: Carl Jung

en_quotes.quote: Most of life is sad
en_quotes.author: Guy Lafleur

en_quotes.quote: One must not let oneself be overwhelmed by sadness
en_quotes.author: Jackie Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: Nobody understands another's sorrow, and nobody another's joy
en_quotes.author: Franz Schubert

en_quotes.quote: I love sad. Sadness makes you feel more than anything
en_quotes.author: Jeff Ament

en_quotes.quote: I don't like people around me sad. I like making people happy
en_quotes.author: Tyler, The Creator

en_quotes.quote: The rose and the thorn, and sorrow and gladness are linked together
en_quotes.author: Saadi

en_quotes.quote: Crying is cleansing. There's a reason for tears, happiness or sadness
en_quotes.author: Dionne Warwick

en_quotes.quote: I love my past, I love my present. I am not ashamed of what I have had, and I am not sad because I no longer have it
en_quotes.author: Sidonie Gabrielle Colette

en_quotes.quote: The day I quit, I want people to be sad about it
en_quotes.author: Gianluigi Buffon

en_quotes.quote: For all sad words of tongue and pen, The saddest are these, 'It might have been'
en_quotes.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

en_quotes.quote: I'm always sad to leave paradise, but I leave behind the hopes of coming again soon
en_quotes.author: Irina Shayk

en_quotes.quote: Don't grieve. Anything you lose comes round in another form
en_quotes.author: Rumi

en_quotes.quote: It's cool to be in your feelings, and it's cool to be sad, and it's cool to feel all of these things
en_quotes.author: Cuco

en_quotes.quote: Sadness is but a wall between two gardens
en_quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

en_quotes.quote: Our sweetest songs are those that tell of saddest thought
en_quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

en_quotes.quote: Worry never robs tomorrow of its sorrow, it only saps today of its joy
en_quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

en_quotes.quote: I do believe that if you haven't learnt about sadness, you cannot appreciate happiness
en_quotes.author: Nana Mouskouri

en_quotes.quote: It's hard to watch your life unfold, and sad. Life changes
en_quotes.author: Cilla Black

en_quotes.quote: I was a sad kid
en_quotes.author: Post Malone

en_quotes.quote: If you don't know about pain and trouble, you're in sad shape. They make you appreciate life
en_quotes.author: Evel Knievel

en_quotes.quote: Your pain is the breaking of the shell that encloses your understanding
en_quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

en_quotes.quote: I was sad and in a dark place, and I turned to a hobby to sort of take me out of that
en_quotes.author: Cole Sprouse

en_quotes.quote: A sad soul can kill quicker than a germ
en_quotes.author: John Steinbeck

en_quotes.quote: Proud people breed sad sorrows for themselves
en_quotes.author: Emily Bronte

en_quotes.quote: How sad it is that we give up on people who are just like us
en_quotes.author: Fred Rogers

en_quotes.quote: Life can be challenging and sad... but music is the easy part
en_quotes.author: St. Vincent

en_quotes.quote: Hear me, my chiefs! I am tired. My heart is sick and sad. From where the sun now stands, I will fight no more forever
en_quotes.author: Chief Joseph

en_quotes.quote: Depression is the inability to construct a future
en_quotes.author: Rollo May

en_quotes.quote: To have felt too much is to end in feeling nothing
en_quotes.author: Dorothy Thompson

en_quotes.quote: Affliction comes to us, not to make us sad but sober; not to make us sorry but wise
en_quotes.author: H. G. Wells

en_quotes.quote: Good humor is the health of the soul, sadness is its poison
en_quotes.author: Philip Stanhope, 4th Earl of Chesterfield

en_quotes.quote: I hold the world but as the world, Gratiano; A stage where every man must play a part, And mine is a sad one
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: I think I drift toward sad love songs
en_quotes.author: Benmont Tench

en_quotes.quote: In deep sadness there is no place for sentimentality
en_quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

en_quotes.quote: It's fun to sing sad songs. And it's fun to listen to sad songs. Enjoyable. Satisfying. Something
en_quotes.author: Richard Thompson

en_quotes.quote: There is no sadder sight than a young pessimist
en_quotes.author: Mark Twain

en_quotes.quote: It is a very sad thing that nowadays there is so little useless information
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: Can I see another's woe, and not be in sorrow too? Can I see another's grief, and not seek for kind relief?
en_quotes.author: William Blake

en_quotes.quote: Participate joyfully in the sorrows of the world. We cannot cure the world of sorrows, but we can choose to live in joy
en_quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

en_quotes.quote: Being an old farm boy myself, chickens coming home to roost never did make me sad; they've always made me glad
en_quotes.author: Malcolm X

en_quotes.quote: My natural disposition is pretty joyful, but you know, I have bad days and sad moments like anybody else
en_quotes.author: Tracee Ellis Ross

en_quotes.quote: I love sad songs. They say so much. I love country music but even the happy songs sound really sad
en_quotes.author: Beth Ditto

en_quotes.quote: And in real life endings aren't always neat, whether they're happy endings, or whether they're sad endings
en_quotes.author: Stephen King

en_quotes.quote: It's sad, something coming to an end. It cracks you open, in a way - cracks you open to feeling
en_quotes.author: Jennifer Aniston

en_quotes.quote: I have the choice of being constantly active and happy or introspectively passive and sad
en_quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

en_quotes.quote: Whenever I am feeling happy or sad, I always find comfort in food
en_quotes.author: Rachel Hollis

en_quotes.quote: The keenest sorrow is to recognize ourselves as the sole cause of all our adversities
en_quotes.author: Sophocles

en_quotes.quote: It is sad not to love, but it is much sadder not to be able to love
en_quotes.author: Miguel de Unamuno

en_quotes.quote: All people are sad clowns. That's the key to comedy - and it's a buffer against reality
en_quotes.author: Bob Odenkirk

en_quotes.quote: The walls we build around us to keep sadness out also keeps out the joy
en_quotes.author: Jim Rohn

en_quotes.quote: I have a complicated relationship with the zoo; maybe everyone does. It's so wonderful and so sad
en_quotes.author: Victoria Coren Mitchell

en_quotes.quote: If a man does not control his temper, it is a sad admission that he is not in control of his thoughts
en_quotes.author: Ezra Taft Benson

en_quotes.quote: Tears are the summer showers to the soul
en_quotes.author: Alfred Austin

en_quotes.quote: The day you think there is no improvements to be made is a sad one for any player
en_quotes.author: Lionel Messi

en_quotes.quote: We never taste a perfect joy; our happiest successes are mixed with sadness
en_quotes.author: Pierre Corneille

en_quotes.quote: Dying is only one thing to be sad over... Living unhappily is something else
en_quotes.author: Morrie Schwartz

en_quotes.quote: The sad thing about artificial intelligence is that it lacks artifice and therefore intelligence
en_quotes.author: Jean Baudrillard

en_quotes.quote: Those who don't know how to weep with their whole heart, don't know how to laugh either
en_quotes.author: Golda Meir

en_quotes.quote: He is a hard man who is only just, and a sad one who is only wise
en_quotes.author: Voltaire

en_quotes.quote: It's a sad day in this country when you can't talk about law and order unless they want to call you a racist
en_quotes.author: George Wallace

en_quotes.quote: It's a sad man my friend who's livin' in his own skin and can't stand the company
en_quotes.author: Bruce Springsteen

en_quotes.quote: Funny and sad are two sides of the same coin. I think that most comedians are able to tap into deep subject matter
en_quotes.author: Hasan Minhaj

en_quotes.quote: I don't have many sad days
en_quotes.author: Billy Graham

en_quotes.quote: A marriage is no amusement but a solemn act, and generally a sad one
en_quotes.author: Queen Victoria

en_quotes.quote: The sad truth is that many behavioral economists know very little about psychology
en_quotes.author: Richard Thaler

en_quotes.quote: The day I am not able to fly will be a sad day for me
en_quotes.author: Ratan Tata

en_quotes.quote: The sad souls of those who lived without blame and without praise
en_quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

en_quotes.quote: I love jazz music and sad music. I'm a sentimental guy. I'm a romantic guy
en_quotes.author: Fred Durst

en_quotes.quote: I feel like when I say something sad, I mean it
en_quotes.author: Kurt Vile

en_quotes.quote: It's very simple, I just tell my sad story, and people weep
en_quotes.author: Corazon Aquino

en_quotes.quote: When sparrows build and the leaves break forth, My old sorrow wakes and cries
en_quotes.author: Jean Ingelow

en_quotes.quote: Sadness is also a kind of defence
en_quotes.author: Ivo Andric

en_quotes.quote: If I'm laughing, you know I'm either very happy or very sad. I cope with things with jokes
en_quotes.author: Cristela Alonzo

en_quotes.quote: I think you have to know how you feel when you're sad and it's healthy to mourn if a relationship ends
en_quotes.author: Leighton Meester

en_quotes.quote: War is very sad and small life is pathetically fragile at times
en_quotes.author: Henry Rollins

en_quotes.quote: There were points in my life where I felt oddly irresistible to women. I'm not in that state now and that makes me sad
en_quotes.author: Jack Nicholson

en_quotes.quote: I can't grow a mustache. It's pretty sad if I attempt to
en_quotes.author: Ashton Kutcher

en_quotes.quote: Death makes us sad, but it can also make us feel more alive
en_quotes.author: Sally Mann

en_quotes.quote: I've always been such a loser with my organisation skills. That has always been one of my sad stand-out points
en_quotes.author: Ella Woodward

en_quotes.quote: Sorrows are like thunderclouds, in the distance they look black, over our heads scarcely gray
en_quotes.author: Jean Paul

en_quotes.quote: I certainly feel sad about the alienation from my son
en_quotes.author: Harold Pinter

en_quotes.quote: Of these years nought remains in memory but the sad feeling that we have advanced and only grown older
en_quotes.author: Max Muller

en_quotes.quote: My lasting impression of Truman Capote is that he was a terribly gentle, terribly sensitive, and terribly sad man
en_quotes.author: Alvin Ailey

en_quotes.quote: It's actually sad to be rich
en_quotes.author: Masayoshi Son

en_quotes.quote: I've got to be high class... Which is sad, because I like bars
en_quotes.author: Daniel Craig

en_quotes.quote: Blue Valentine' was a really sad movie, but I loved the moments when they're discovering each other for the first time
en_quotes.author: Sam Heughan

en_quotes.quote: I think it is really sad that when people lose their homes they kind of lose their minds too
en_quotes.author: Margaret Cho

en_quotes.quote: I had sadness for breakfast
en_quotes.author: Andy Milonakis

en_quotes.quote: I think social media has taken over for our generation. It's a big part of our lives, and it's kind of sad
en_quotes.author: Kendall Jenner

en_quotes.quote: It's a sad and stupid thing to have to proclaim yourself a revolutionary just to be a decent man
en_quotes.author: David Harris

en_quotes.quote: First, accept sadness. Realize that without losing, winning isn't so great
en_quotes.author: Alyssa Milano

en_quotes.quote: The sad fact is that horrendous human conflict is nothing new
en_quotes.author: Peter Maurer

en_quotes.quote: Fortune has played me a sad trick by letting me live on and on
en_quotes.author: Belle Boyd

en_quotes.quote: He who is not just is severe, he who is not wise is sad
en_quotes.author: Voltaire

en_quotes.quote: It is a sad thing when men have neither the wit to speak well nor the judgment to hold their tongues
en_quotes.author: Jean de la Bruyere

en_quotes.quote: The excursion is the same when you go looking for your sorrow as when you go looking for your joy
en_quotes.author: Eudora Welty

en_quotes.quote: The move to hide aging is sort of sad. But it's a wonderful thing to celebrate our aging
en_quotes.author: Jesse Ball

en_quotes.quote: Better by far you should forget and smile that you should remember and be sad
en_quotes.author: Christina Rossetti

en_quotes.quote: Most of the time, we keep looking outside and feeling sad about what others have. Those are mere excuses
en_quotes.author: Yami Gautam

en_quotes.quote: Don't eat because you're angry, bored, sad, or stressed
en_quotes.author: John Rampton

en_quotes.quote: Whenever the lion fish in the fish tank in the captain's ready room died it was always a sad moment
en_quotes.author: Patrick Stewart

en_quotes.quote: It feels really sad, to me, to go to a dark bedroom. It's like surrendering to the night or something
en_quotes.author: James Franco

en_quotes.quote: The sad duty of politics is to establish justice in a sinful world
en_quotes.author: Reinhold Niebuhr

en_quotes.quote: The display of grief makes more demands than grief itself. How few men are sad in their own company
en_quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

en_quotes.quote: There's a lot of insecure, sad people in any profession
en_quotes.author: Martin Short

en_quotes.quote: Next to a lost battle, nothing is so sad as a battle that has been won
en_quotes.author: Duke of Wellington

en_quotes.quote: It doesn't help to contemplate how sad your life is. You have to move on
en_quotes.author: Teri Garr

en_quotes.quote: There are so many reasons to be sad in the club
en_quotes.author: Stromae

en_quotes.quote: You are validating someone's life by telling their story. Even if it's a sad one
en_quotes.author: Alex Tizon

en_quotes.quote: My favorite thing in the world is a quiz show, 'University Challenge,' so you can see what kind of sad person I am
en_quotes.author: Lynne Truss

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes I wonder if suicides aren't in fact sad guardians of the meaning of life
en_quotes.author: Vaclav Havel

en_quotes.quote: I had a daughter and lost her a long while ago. That's too sad a story to go into
en_quotes.author: Gene Wilder

en_quotes.quote: I don't have any problem with being the guy whose album people put on when they're feeling sad
en_quotes.author: Sam Smith

en_quotes.quote: My mother and father were very strange people. They tried to be funny which is always very sad to me
en_quotes.author: Jonathan Winters

en_quotes.quote: When I was going through sad times, I'd watch 'Cheers' at the end of the day to make me feel better
en_quotes.author: Mary Steenburgen

en_quotes.quote: People are so codified - it's sad
en_quotes.author: Jean Paul Gaultier

en_quotes.quote: Even when I'm in quite a happy state of mind, I like writing really sad songs. I think a lot of people do
en_quotes.author: Ellie Goulding

en_quotes.quote: I think women should be seductive, not triste. There's enough sadness in life now without making women look sad, too
en_quotes.author: Azzedine Alaia

en_quotes.quote: Whenever I'm sad, I just put on 'SpongeBob' and I cheer up
en_quotes.author: Richard Harmon

en_quotes.quote: Gun violence and social justice are near and dear to my heart. And they are so connected it's sad
en_quotes.author: Jason Winston George

en_quotes.quote: I'm so glad I spent 10 years being sad and lonely
en_quotes.author: Caitlin Moran

en_quotes.quote: I know for works for me - those wonderful sad love songs
en_quotes.author: Toni Braxton

en_quotes.quote: It would be sad if we lost our instinct and our courage to love and protect
en_quotes.author: Emeli Sande

en_quotes.quote: I'm not sad about any of my life. It's so unconventional. It doesn't look anything like I thought it would
en_quotes.author: Edie Falco

en_quotes.quote: It sounds a bit sad, but my new hobby is knitting. I love it. I find it really relaxing
en_quotes.author: Ella Henderson

en_quotes.quote: It's not like I force myself to think of sad things, but... it's more that I make music because it makes me happy
en_quotes.author: Jamie xx

en_quotes.quote: Jean Thompson's short-story collection 'Who Do You Love' is a beautiful book, but a hell of a sad one
en_quotes.author: Jeff Giles

en_quotes.quote: Nothing is as sad as seeing a person who used to have power have none
en_quotes.author: Abraham A. Ribicoff

en_quotes.quote: They say geniuses mostly have great mothers. They mostly have sad fates
en_quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

en_quotes.quote: If I don't make it, I'll be very sad that there are things I didn't do, but I'm happy that I've done what I have
en_quotes.author: Stephen Jay Gould

en_quotes.quote: His death was the first time that Ed Wynn ever made anyone sad
en_quotes.author: Red Skelton

en_quotes.quote: In this world, full often, our joys are only the tender shadows which our sorrows cast
en_quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

en_quotes.quote: It's sad how people want to see us females go against each other. Never been for that. Never will
en_quotes.author: Ciara

en_quotes.quote: Cancer is a very sad thing, but you can always take something from every experience
en_quotes.author: Pierce Brosnan

en_quotes.quote: The sad truth is that most of my husbands turned out to be convincing liars
en_quotes.author: Joan Collins

en_quotes.quote: Things that I feel really sad about, I talk about. That way, if it's funny, it doesn't hurt anymore
en_quotes.author: Pete Davidson

en_quotes.quote: Being on your own would be sad, sick and weird. I don't trust myself. I need that balance
en_quotes.author: Daniel Craig

en_quotes.quote: One should either be sad or joyful. Contentment is a warm sty for eaters and sleepers
en_quotes.author: Eugene O'Neill

en_quotes.quote: I think love's exciting and happy, as well as being able to make you sad
en_quotes.author: Billy Idol

en_quotes.quote: Dwight is a sad clown. You've seen those paintings of sad clown
en_quotes.author: Rainn Wilson

en_quotes.quote: Being single is only sad if you have a problem with your own company. I'm content with mine
en_quotes.author: Olga Kurylenko

en_quotes.quote: It's sad that we never get trained to leave assumptions behind
en_quotes.author: Sebastian Thrun

en_quotes.quote: When I moved out of my mom's house at 18 I was almost as sad to leave her sewing machine behind as anything else
en_quotes.author: Beth Ditto

en_quotes.quote: When I need to cry, I think of very sad things, mostly about animals
en_quotes.author: Quvenzhane Wallis

en_quotes.quote: What I am sad about is that there is now, in America, no equivalent to the art circuit
en_quotes.author: Richard Attenborough

en_quotes.quote: I think that's very sad, that I haven't allowed my heart to be broken. I have broken a few
en_quotes.author: Sally Field

en_quotes.quote: I don't mind if what they write about me has some truth in it. Pure imagination makes me feel sad about the whole thing
en_quotes.author: Shaheer Sheikh

en_quotes.quote: Anytime a curtain closes forever, that's always sad news
en_quotes.author: Gennady Golovkin

en_quotes.quote: Beauty makes idiots sad and wise men merry
en_quotes.author: George Jean Nathan

en_quotes.quote: I live on a train. I know - what a sad thing to admit. I am the New-Age Willy Loman. But there it is
en_quotes.author: Christopher Buckley

en_quotes.quote: The Junction Point journey is over. To all those who've asked, or want to ask, I'm sad but excited for the future
en_quotes.author: Warren Spector

en_quotes.quote: As any human does, I have my happy times and sad times
en_quotes.author: Amber Liu

en_quotes.quote: I love playing football, being out on the pitch with a ball, and I will be a little sad when that ends
en_quotes.author: Dennis Bergkamp

en_quotes.quote: I think I have a dark view of the world. I have to make everything funny, otherwise it all seems so sad
en_quotes.author: Moon Unit Zappa

en_quotes.quote: I'm proud of my invention, but I'm sad that it is used by terrorists
en_quotes.author: Mikhail Kalashnikov

en_quotes.quote: Life is sad. People, you know, are going to pass, and you know that you will one day
en_quotes.author: James Mercer

en_quotes.quote: I am not a sad clown. I am not a sad clown
en_quotes.author: Nathan Lane

en_quotes.quote: It's sad that you don't see drivers being real people
en_quotes.author: Jacques Villeneuve

en_quotes.quote: I'm terribly sad about Farrah's passing. She was incredibly brave, and God will be welcoming her with open arms
en_quotes.author: Cheryl Ladd

en_quotes.quote: My little son, Atticus, desperately needs his dad and I haven't been there for him... and that's sad
en_quotes.author: Daniel Baldwin

en_quotes.quote: The history of apartheid-era South Africa is incredibly sad and at times infuriatingly incomprehensible
en_quotes.author: Henry Rollins

en_quotes.quote: The problem, when comparing contemporary television to television in 1974, is that TV has become not just bad but sad
en_quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

en_quotes.quote: Fashion is that thing that saved me from being sad
en_quotes.author: Lady Gaga

en_quotes.quote: I pity my brother Ferdinand, knowing by my own feelings how sad a thing it is to live apart from one's family
en_quotes.author: Marie Antoinette

en_quotes.quote: Women get the attention when we get into the men's arena, and that's sad
en_quotes.author: Billie Jean King

en_quotes.quote: Poverty makes you sad as well as wise
en_quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht

en_quotes.quote: I was a very sad little girl
en_quotes.author: Julie Andrews

en_quotes.quote: Words are less needful to sorrow than to joy
en_quotes.author: Helen Hunt Jackson

en_quotes.quote: It's sad when you say a $30 million film is an inexpensive film, but it is
en_quotes.author: Sandra Bullock

en_quotes.quote: As I kid, I read the 'Little House on the Prairie' series and was sad when I got to the last book
en_quotes.author: Rachel Boston

en_quotes.quote: It would be a sad day if we British stopped being cynical, but you sometimes wonder whether we overdo it
en_quotes.author: Boris Johnson

en_quotes.quote: I'm not tired of who I am. That would be sad!
en_quotes.author: Diane von Furstenberg

en_quotes.quote: This is a sick business. It's so sad
en_quotes.author: Sia

en_quotes.quote: I still really like newspapers. I'm gonna feel really sad when they go. Or not - maybe I'll be dead
en_quotes.author: Michael Keaton

en_quotes.quote: That is sad until one recalls how many bad books the world may yet be spared because of the busyness of writers
en_quotes.author: Gore Vidal

en_quotes.quote: Ninety percent of people who lose weight gain it back. It's very sad
en_quotes.author: Richard Simmons

en_quotes.quote: It's really a sad story, and I liked that. The songs on this album talk about relationships in every aspect
en_quotes.author: Aaliyah

en_quotes.quote: I never want to go out wearing something sad
en_quotes.author: Alessandro Michele

en_quotes.quote: When I talk about sad things, I talk about sad things
en_quotes.author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu

en_quotes.quote: We all like stories that make us cry. It's so nice to feel sad when you've nothing in particular to feel sad about
en_quotes.author: Anne Sullivan

en_quotes.quote: Well, you know, too much democracy is a sort of sad thing
en_quotes.author: Ann Richards

en_quotes.quote: Most performers are used to the highs and the lows. If you can let a low stop you, that would be a sad commentary
en_quotes.author: Jerry Lewis

en_quotes.quote: Well, darkness with humor... I'm not an extremely suicidal or sad person
en_quotes.author: Peter Steele

en_quotes.quote: Your joys and sorrows. You can never tell them. You cheapen the inside of yourself if you do tell them
en_quotes.author: Greta Garbo

en_quotes.quote: You get used to sadness, growing up in the mountains, I guess
en_quotes.author: Loretta Lynn

en_quotes.quote: Sad Patience, too near neighbour to despair
en_quotes.author: Matthew Arnold

en_quotes.quote: I always wanted to write a sad song that sounds happy. I think everyone can relate to this emotion
en_quotes.author: Kirstin Maldonado

en_quotes.quote: If you go through life, and you don't find the beauty in an unexpected place, then you really have a sad existence
en_quotes.author: Octavia Spencer

en_quotes.quote: The sad fact is that spending rises every year, no matter what people want or say they want
en_quotes.author: Ben Stein

en_quotes.quote: It's a sad state when more people retweet than buy records
en_quotes.author: Noel Gallagher

en_quotes.quote: I'm not sad at all about turning 40
en_quotes.author: Halle Berry

en_quotes.quote: Whenever I have too much downtime, I start to get sad
en_quotes.author: Tyler Posey

en_quotes.quote: I love music videos, I really do. I think it's kind of sad that it's a dying art form
en_quotes.author: Adam Levine

en_quotes.quote: I don't know who would not classify themselves as a romantic. I think that would be sort of sad
en_quotes.author: Natalie Portman

en_quotes.quote: I don't want to see myself as this sad, disabled girl. I know that. I don't want other people to see me as that, either
en_quotes.author: Amy Purdy

en_quotes.quote: The world changes fast, and a lot of the old country folks have a hard time keeping up with it, and it makes them sad
en_quotes.author: Jason Isbell

en_quotes.quote: I usually don't cry at movies, although I will get sad. I'm okay with it, though. It's good to make people cry
en_quotes.author: Jacob Tremblay

en_quotes.quote: Nobody wants to hear R&B. It's sad. If you want to be on the radio you got to stay young
en_quotes.author: Jamie Foxx

en_quotes.quote: It's sad that some people who have one exciting moment spend the rest of their lives rehashing it
en_quotes.author: Jonathan Kozol

en_quotes.quote: Everybody likes Johnny Cash. I think the sad part of it is his health is givin' him problems
en_quotes.author: Merle Haggard

en_quotes.quote: I end up doing selfies 'cause I am so sad
en_quotes.author: Rita Ora

en_quotes.quote: It's so sad, actually, how teachers and parents tell their kids, 'You're never gonna be anything.'
en_quotes.author: Solange Knowles

en_quotes.quote: Commerce seems to be covering every aspect of our lives now. Which me, because I'm a romantic, is sad for me to say
en_quotes.author: Jeremy Irons

en_quotes.quote: I get lots of requests from people to write sad songs, and I'm like, 'No, that's rubbish patter.'
en_quotes.author: Lewis Capaldi

en_quotes.quote: I fear that I won't work in the theatre again. I'm sad about that. But I won't retire
en_quotes.author: Maggie Smith

en_quotes.quote: I'm convinced I got signed because of who I am. And it makes me sad
en_quotes.author: Jeff Buckley

en_quotes.quote: I'm convinced part of the reason I got signed is because of who I am, and it makes me sad
en_quotes.author: Jeff Buckley

en_quotes.quote: I will be very sad and worried if the imperialist government was calling me a great democratic man
en_quotes.author: Hugo Chavez

en_quotes.quote: I want to be a voice people listen to and feel good or sad or whatever
en_quotes.author: Jorja Smith

en_quotes.quote: I love curves; I'm all about curves. I don't have many, which is really sad, but I think the more the better
en_quotes.author: Cara Delevingne

en_quotes.quote: Christmas makes everything twice as sad
en_quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

en_quotes.quote: I think I would be very sad if I wasn't able to have a baby
en_quotes.author: Nicole Kidman

en_quotes.quote: When DVDs finally disappear, I'm going to be sad. I'll miss the commentaries
en_quotes.author: Matt Groening

en_quotes.quote: I'll always be sad that my marriage ended
en_quotes.author: Shania Twain

en_quotes.quote: Whenever we lose, it is a sad day
en_quotes.author: Sergio Ramos

en_quotes.quote: I just like a good, sad song. The sadder, the better. It moves me
en_quotes.author: John Prine

en_quotes.quote: What I find sad is that the New Age movement is primarily a commercial undertaking. But it is answering to a human need
en_quotes.author: Laura Esquivel

en_quotes.quote: It's the sad thing about entertainment, it's not always about who is the best
en_quotes.author: Jake Roberts

en_quotes.quote: The Fault in Our Stars' is a beautiful film that's really positive. The second half gets sad, but it's always positive
en_quotes.author: Ansel Elgort

en_quotes.quote: I'm more apt to cry at something beautiful than at something sad
en_quotes.author: Teller

en_quotes.quote: But I'm not like sad, depressed miserable person. I guess sometimes I give off that impression
en_quotes.author: Edward Furlong

en_quotes.quote: The old know what they want; the young are sad and bewildered
en_quotes.author: Logan Pearsall Smith

en_quotes.quote: I'm sad I'm not in 'The Purge 2.'
en_quotes.author: Lena Headey

en_quotes.quote: Though I know he loves me, tonight my heart is sad; his kiss was not so wonderful as all the dreams I had
en_quotes.author: Sara Teasdale

en_quotes.quote: I don't ever want to be sad about my life
en_quotes.author: Tammy Duckworth

en_quotes.quote: The saddest thing that befalls a soul is when it loses faith in God and woman
en_quotes.author: Alexander Smith

en_quotes.quote: I think about my father and how sad it was that he never had grandchildren
en_quotes.author: Cate Blanchett

en_quotes.quote: Those who gave away their wings are sad not to see them fly
en_quotes.author: Antonio Porchia

en_quotes.quote: Let us remember that sorrow alone is the creator of great things
en_quotes.author: Ernest Renan

en_quotes.quote: This Olympics is almost a little sad. It is my final Olympics. There are a lot of good memories
en_quotes.author: Bonnie Blair

en_quotes.quote: It was sad when Sid Vicious died... I was freaked out when Phil Lynott died from Thin Lizzy. I cried. It was too crazy
en_quotes.author: Dee Dee Ramone

en_quotes.quote: I just want real reactions. I want people to laugh from the gut, be sad from the gut - or get angry from the gut
en_quotes.author: Andy Kaufman

en_quotes.quote: We tell our triumphs to the crowds, but our own hearts are the sole confidants of our sorrows
en_quotes.author: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

en_quotes.quote: Whether it's something happy or sad, I like to share everything with my mother
en_quotes.author: Karishma Tanna

en_quotes.quote: I don't consider myself a celebrity. That would be kind of sad
en_quotes.author: Adam Driver

en_quotes.quote: It's sad when people break up
en_quotes.author: Pete Townshend

en_quotes.quote: I play sad bastard music. For the money
en_quotes.author: Josh Tillman

en_quotes.quote: I find America falling in love with a TV show flattering and interesting, but at the same time a little sad
en_quotes.author: David Schwimmer

en_quotes.quote: I have a stepladder. It's a very nice stepladder but it's sad that I never knew my real ladder
en_quotes.author: Craig Charles

en_quotes.quote: I find it a bit sad that there is no photo of me hanging on the walls in the Berlin Museum at Checkpoint Charlie
en_quotes.author: David Hasselhoff

en_quotes.quote: Red is the ultimate cure for sadness
en_quotes.author: Bill Blass

en_quotes.quote: It's really easy to do sad; you just put on some sad music and write dramatically - everybody can do that
en_quotes.author: Jill Soloway

en_quotes.quote: I'm so grounded, it's sad
en_quotes.author: Patti LaBelle

en_quotes.quote: I like to be sad once in a while. You need it for your equilibrium
en_quotes.author: Marjane Satrapi

en_quotes.quote: Women often don't want to be typecast as the girl that's sad
en_quotes.author: Julia Michaels

en_quotes.quote: Everyone feels sad occasionally. A full range of emotions is part of what makes us human
en_quotes.author: Michael Greger

en_quotes.quote: You know how sad your life is when you know the release date of DVDs
en_quotes.author: Heston Blumenthal

en_quotes.quote: Football is a sad game
en_quotes.author: George Best

en_quotes.quote: Do not make best friends with a melancholy sad soul. They always are heavily loaded, and you must bear half
en_quotes.author: Francois Fenelon

en_quotes.quote: I'm very free with all my emotions, whether it's happy, sad, mad, glad, whatever
en_quotes.author: Kimberly Elise

en_quotes.quote: It is sad to see a woman sacrificing the ties of the affections even to do good
en_quotes.author: Maria Mitchell

en_quotes.quote: I was at the Olympic Games winning medals and I still doubted my image. I doubted what I looked like. That's sad
en_quotes.author: Shawn Johnson

en_quotes.quote: You want people to feel something when you tell a story, whether they feel happy or whether they feel sad
en_quotes.author: Harry Dean Stanton

en_quotes.quote: I was singing the blues when I was six. Kind of sad, eh?
en_quotes.author: Harry Dean Stanton

en_quotes.quote: It's incredible that they censor films. It's sad
en_quotes.author: Dario Argento

en_quotes.quote: It's sad that arts are not part of the curriculum across the nation
en_quotes.author: Rosie Perez

en_quotes.quote: When I'm a bit sad, I often go for a drive in the country, quite fast with my music up
en_quotes.author: Calvin Harris

en_quotes.quote: All my work shares a kind of balance between black comedy and sad and despairing melancholy
en_quotes.author: Martin McDonagh

en_quotes.quote: When I first started writing, I wrote really sad, emotional songs which were all slow
en_quotes.author: Anne-Marie

en_quotes.quote: When I see people sad, I'm sad
en_quotes.author: Anne-Marie

en_quotes.quote: You mustn't smile when you lose. You have to be sad like other people. You have to win every game
en_quotes.author: Eden Hazard

en_quotes.quote: I remembered myself as an unpopular and rather sad kid
en_quotes.author: Sydney Pollack

en_quotes.quote: In my kids' school, the married family is an anomaly... which I do think is sad. I do believe in marriage
en_quotes.author: Marcia Gay Harden

en_quotes.quote: I'm always sad to see a relationship not work, but what happens between two people is not my business
en_quotes.author: Debbie Reynolds

en_quotes.quote: I don't know if my work is a concerted effort to make kids sad!
en_quotes.author: Patricia Polacco

en_quotes.quote: We all go through sad times, but I was brought up to be positive
en_quotes.author: Jess Glynne

en_quotes.quote: It's a sad day when Republicans will attack fellow Republicans on an issue as fundamental as free enterprise
en_quotes.author: Doug Ducey

en_quotes.quote: I'm sad that it's uncool or offensive to talk about environmental or human rights issues
en_quotes.author: Grimes

en_quotes.quote: For me, it is sad when I listen to this, that one player must be more selfish to reach the top level
en_quotes.author: Antonio Conte

en_quotes.quote: People just get kicks out of making other people sad
en_quotes.author: Maisie Williams

en_quotes.quote: As far as Big Show, I think he's a crier. He cried when Hulk Hogan retired, too. Can't take him to a sad movie, either
en_quotes.author: Scott Steiner

en_quotes.quote: Everything's complicated, even those things that seem flat in their bleakness or sadness
en_quotes.author: Nick Hornby

en_quotes.quote: Novi Sad is a really beautiful city, and the club is really nice. It is one of the best youth academies in Serbia
en_quotes.author: Dusan Tadic

en_quotes.quote: If I'm kind of sad or depressed, it doesn't necessarily help me to write a song about exactly what I'm depressed about
en_quotes.author: Julia Holter

en_quotes.quote: I'm always sad
en_quotes.author: Farrah Abraham

en_quotes.quote: It makes me so desperately sad to witness just how unforgivably wretched our world has become
en_quotes.author: Ralph Steadman

en_quotes.quote: It makes me sad there is still some intellectual snobbery out there
en_quotes.author: Steve Easterbrook

en_quotes.quote: Between 2014 and 2016, I was just, like, extremely sad. Like, really, really just not able to be in the spotlight
en_quotes.author: Robyn

en_quotes.quote: I don't know how the poor farmers deal with such situations in real life. It's really sad
en_quotes.author: Sanjay Dutt

en_quotes.quote: Without strenuous preplanning, road food is almost always bad food, sad food, chain food, clown food
en_quotes.author: Jonathan Miles

en_quotes.quote: I'm one of those people that, if I'm sad or depressed, I don't talk to people about it. I bottle it in
en_quotes.author: Marie Lu

en_quotes.quote: I like to write from a slightly sad or complicated place. But with a sense of hope and happiness at the same time
en_quotes.author: Eliot Sumner

en_quotes.quote: I've always been very supported. I've never really been sad. I've just been broke. They are very different things
en_quotes.author: Daveed Diggs

en_quotes.quote: School was unbelievably painful. It was five years of being pretty sad
en_quotes.author: Adwoa Aboah

en_quotes.quote: I can't deal with waking up and being sad
en_quotes.author: Adwoa Aboah

en_quotes.quote: The world would be a very sad place if readers could only love one story
en_quotes.author: Sylvia Day

en_quotes.quote: Actually, the moment of victory is wonderful, but also sad. It means that your trip is ended
en_quotes.author: Bill Toomey

en_quotes.quote: Guys should not be allowed to use the Internet all day long. So sad
en_quotes.author: Natasha Leggero

en_quotes.quote: My father comes from a generation of film that actors my age don't even know about, which is really sad
en_quotes.author: Amber Tamblyn

en_quotes.quote: It's sad that we have become so accustomed to bad service that we're shocked when we get good service
en_quotes.author: Neil Cavuto

en_quotes.quote: I don't buy art just to make artists happy any more than I want to make them sad if I sell their work
en_quotes.author: Charles Saatchi

en_quotes.quote: It's a sad day when a woman being funny and interested in science is considered newsworthy
en_quotes.author: Elise Andrew

en_quotes.quote: Tears are the natural penalties of pleasure. It is a law that we should pay for all that we enjoy
en_quotes.author: William Gilmore Simms

en_quotes.quote: So war is an extremely sad business, because the majority of people don't want to be in it
en_quotes.author: Gerald Scarfe

en_quotes.quote: My acting's very understated. I think my sad and happy don't play that differently onscreen
en_quotes.author: Bret McKenzie

en_quotes.quote: The poem is sad because it wants to be yours, and cannot be
en_quotes.author: John Ashbery
